title: Interactions of plant stress and herbivory: intraspecific variation in the susceptibility of a palatable versus an unpalatable seaweed to sea urchin grazing

container: Journal of Experimental Marine Biology and Ecology
title: Predator foraging behavior: effect of a novel prey species on prey selection by a marine intertidal gastropod
Specialist herbivores reduce their susceptibility to predation by feeding on the chemically defended seaweed Avrainvillea longicaulis
